Name: team_members_available
Description: All team members should be available for the sprint

Name: employee_skills_match
Description: Employees must have required skills for assigned tasks

Name: user_story_acceptance
Description: User stories should be accepted in the sprint review

Name: development_snapshot_created
Description: A development snapshot must be created at the end of each sprint

Name: blocker_resolved
Description: All blockers should be resolved before proceeding to the next sprint

Name: stakeholder_satisfaction
Description: Stakeholders should be satisfied with the product development

Name: release_plan_completed
Description: Release plan for the current version must be completed
